column2: What do you wish that “past you” knew about data management and sharing?
column3: What practices have you changed (how has your workflow changed)?
column4: If you've engaged in open science practices, which ones?
column5: What have you learned by engaging in these practices?

column3: I plan to share everything or close to it; extensive use of GitHub; continuous integration.
column5: It's fun; I feel that my work is more robust.
